sentences.sContent: They'll entice thousands of doctors to move from the cities to the rural areas by paying them better salaries.
sentences.sCn: 他们将通过支付更高的薪水怂恿成千上万的医生从城市迁往农村。

sentences.sContent: Retailers have tried almost everything, from cheap credit to free flights, to entice shoppers through their doors.
sentences.sCn: 从低价信贷到免费航班，零售商们几乎用尽一切办法说服购物者惠顾。

words.tran: 诱惑；怂恿；引诱物；吸引力

trans.tranOther: To entice someone to go somewhere or to do something means to try to persuade them to go to that place or to do that thing
